definition: (old) to report to one's master
to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
matter/thing/item/work/affair/CL:件[jian4],樁|桩[zhuang1],回[hui2]
one thing/the same as
two quite different things/two unrelated matters
not regard as a matter (of any importance)
not bad at all/quite impressive
what's the matter?/what's going on?/how could that be?/how did that come about?/what's it all about?
to take seriously (often with negative expression: "don't take it too seriously")/to treat conscientiously
erhua variant of 當回事|当回事[dang4 hui2 shi4]
Saying is one thing, doing quite another (idiom)
pinyin: shuo1 shi4 yi1 hui2 shi4 , zuo4 you4 shi4 ling4 wai4 yi1 hui2 shi4
containing_words.word: 說是一回事，做又是另外一回事

definition: Saying is one thing, doing quite another (idiom)
pinyin: shuo1 shi4 yi1 hui2 shi4 , zuo4 you4 shi4 ling4 wai4 yi1 hui2 shi4
containing_words.word: 說是一回事，做又是另外一回事

definition: see 說是一回事，做又是另外一回事|说是一回事，做又是另外一回事[shuo1 shi4 yi1 hui2 shi4 , zuo4 you4 shi4 ling4 wai4 yi1 hui2 shi4]
pinyin: shuo1 shi4 yi1 hui2 shi4 , er2 zuo4 you4 shi4 ling4 wai4 yi1 hui2 shi4
containing_words.word: 說是一回事，而做又是另外一回事

definition: see 說是一回事，做又是另外一回事|说是一回事，做又是另外一回事[shuo1 shi4 yi1 hui2 shi4 , zuo4 you4 shi4 ling4 wai4 yi1 hui2 shi4]
pinyin: shuo1 shi4 yi1 hui2 shi4 , er2 zuo4 you4 shi4 ling4 wai4 yi1 hui2 shi4
containing_words.word: 說是一回事，而做又是另外一回事

sentences.english: He is only teasing. Don't take it so seriously.
sentences.chinese: 他不過是戲弄而已，別太當回事兒。

sentences.english: No one could account for the fact that one of the boxes was extremely heavy.
sentences.chinese: 此中有隻箱子特別重，可誰也弄不清是怎麼回事。

sentences.english: I only know that it happened because at some stage I awoke.
sentences.chinese: 我只知道有這麼回事，因爲在這個過程中我曾經醒過。

sentences.english: Is palmar desquamate how to return a responsibility?
Whether or not they will take a leaf out of that book is another matter.
sentences.chinese: 女人們是否能從這本書中得到教益是另外一回事。

sentences.english: He then decides to find out what that scooter really is and slams on his brakes.
sentences.chinese: 他想看看到底這個人是怎麼回事，他就來了個急剎車。

sentences.english: I asked him about it he said "I don't know what you're talking about Megan".
sentences.chinese: 我回短信問他怎麼回事兒，他說“你說什麼哪梅根”。

sentences.english: Ann: Hardship is one thing, the other thing is the conceptions and practices of child education.
sentences.chinese: 辛苦是一回事，教育孩子的觀念和做法又是另一回事。

sentences.english: Ann: Hardship is one thing, the other thing is the conceptions and practices of child education.
sentences.chinese: 辛苦是一回事，教育孩子的觀念和做法又是另一回事。

sentences.english: He beckoned Natasha, and asked her what had happened.
sentences.chinese: 他把娜塔莎喊來，並且問她這是怎麼回事。

sentences.english: Whether Apple actually wants to compete with Acer and Asus is another matter.
sentences.chinese: 蘋果是否真的想要與宏基和華碩競爭是另一回事。

sentences.english: Axillary how is itching to return a responsibility?
What's going on? I thought as he trudged out the door.
sentences.chinese: 看着他艱難的走出了門，我在想這是怎麼回事？

sentences.english: It seems that he's just not taking this issue seriously.
sentences.chinese: 他看上去似乎沒把這問題當回事。

definition: one thing/the same as
an expression of opinion/according to some
what's the matter?/what's going on?/how could that be?/how did that come about?/what's it all about?
two quite different things/another kettle of fish
two quite different things/two unrelated matters
actually/as it turns out/indeed/of course
toy/plaything/thing/act/trick (in a performance, stage show, acrobatics etc)
erhua variant of 玩意[wan2 yi4]
returning to our main topic,.../that said,.../again,.../in this connection/in passing/nevertheless,.../anyhow
to take seriously (often with negative expression: "don't take it too seriously")/to treat conscientiously
from the start/absolutely/entirely/simply
Is it possible that ... ?
to make sense/reasonable
no wonder!/so that's why!
puzzled/bewildered
good action, deed, thing or work (also sarcastic, "a fine thing indeed")/charity/happy occasion/Daoist or Buddhist ceremony for the souls of the dead
to be meddlesome
